special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
special_abilities.desc: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration.
special_abilities.desc: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw.
